name: The Staff of Law
overview: The Land has been ravished for 100 years by the evil Lord Foul. You will be entrusted with the fate of the Land, you must endeavour to find and collect the 7 symbols of Power. These being :- Cross, Ruby, Dagger, Sword, Sceptre, Ring & the Staff of Law. According to Computer Gamer (May 1986) this game was also sold as a Quill Corner download via Compunet.
